originalText.text: I purchased the Bright Pesto Greens Salad Bowl from Fresh Direct and it went right in the garbage. The greens looked old and tired, some were mushy and some were brown, and the delicious looking cashews and beets and other fresh ingredients on the package were in reality these little chopped up unidentifiable piles of mush. I actually laughed when I compared the package to the real product but I won't be laughing when I call the company to complain.

originalText.text: VERY disappointed! I bought the ginger sesame greens salad. Pic looked great on front. Mainly bought it because of the whole cashews in it. I figured it would be worth the more  expensive price. NO cashews. The sliced carrots were a few shredded carrots and did not see the pepitas unless they were mixed with the few shredded carrots. Pic does   not show shredded.   Is this false advertising ?

originalText.text: Ark Foods salads have become an absolute go-to in our household for healthy, quality salads while on the go, and we love the veggie bowls - particularly the cauli mac + cheese for easy weeknight sides.
